testcase.name: calculateDamage > should calculate positive damage correctly
calculateDamage > should deal a minimum of 1 damage when attack is less than defense
calculateDamage > should deal a minimum of 1 damage when attack is equal to defense
DataManager > should load all monster data from files
DataManager > should load all item data from files
DataManager > should load all equipment data from files
DataManager > should load the map layout for floor 1 correctly
DataManager > should return undefined for non-existent data
FileStorage > should set/get/remove items and report length/key correctly
handleMove > should allow player to move to an empty tile
handleMove > should not allow player to move out of bounds
handleMove > should not allow player to move into a wall
handleMove > should make monster turn left to face player
handleMove > should make monster turn right to face player
handleMove > should only turn player on first press in a new direction
handleMove > should move player on second press in the same direction
handleMove > should turn, then do nothing when moving into a wall
handleMove > should set interactionState to item_pickup when moving onto an item
handleMove > should correctly pick up a key and update player state
handleOpenDoor > should allow player to open a door
handleUsePotion > should heal the player and consume the potion
handleUsePotion > should not heal beyond maxhp
handleUsePotion > should do nothing if player has no potion
SaveManager + FileStorage integration > should save and load a game using FileStorage
